mutants.code:
def reverse_words(s):
    words = s.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::-1] for word in words]
    result = ''.join(reversed_words)
    return result

def reverse_words(s):
    words = s.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::+1] for word in words]
    result = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return result

def reverse_words(s):
    words = s.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::-2] for word in words]
    result = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return result

def reverse_words(s):
    words = s.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::-0] for word in words]
    result = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return result

def reverse_words(s):
    words = s.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::-0] for word in words]
    result = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return result

def reverse_words(s):
    words = s.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::--1] for word in words]
    result = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return result
